Payment Method: When working with an employer, I request that all payments be made through SafePay and that I will accept payments via: check or Paypal once a relationship is established.
Communication: I prefer to be contacted via phone, text, e-mail and/or Skype. The frequency will depend on the project.
General Availability:I have a day job, so I am only available during the evenings 5 pm to 10 pm and weekends. If I am needed any other time, it will have to be discussed.
Feedback / Endorsement:I would like employers to leave the appropriate feedback to help my reputation. In return I will do the same for those that hire me for a job.
Code of Ethics / Guarantee Policy:You can put you confidence in my abilities that I will complete your job to your satisfaction and I will not accept payment until you are completely satisfied with the finished product. I will complete all projects in the latest SolidWorks software, create PDFs of all drawings. Once complete, I will upload all files to Dropbox and send link.

abstrac: Training, Learning & Development professional with proven track record of successful development and implementation of eLearning projects across multiple industries.
bio:
eLearning Specialist
Daryl is an Instructional Designer/eLearning Specialist. He has extensive eLearning experience utilizing various authoring tools including Adobe Captivate, Camtasia Studio and Articulate Studio & Storyline. Daryl has the resources and ability to expertly contribute to any phase of the Instructional Design/eLearning process. Through the ADDIE model, he conducts thorough needs analysis for customer directed learning outcomes. He has the ability to manage multiple projects in an organized manner.  Daryl holds a Certificate of Completion for the "Create eLearning and mLearning with Adobe Captivate" course.

Payment process depends upon terms of the project.  For smaller, short-term projects, 50% due upon contract acceptance, 25% due upon reaching 75% of established milestones, 25% due upon completion of project.  For longer projects, 25% due at contract acceptance, then weekly time cards / payments until project completion.

abstrac: basic website design using html and jpg
bio:
I have been using computers since the late 1990's and since then have taken courses in computer operations,diagnostics and intro into the internet.Throughout my time at home with my 2 children i have been self teaching myself website design and core html.This was slightly touched on in my computer classes but i needed to take it further.

I really enjoy delving into website design and I pay close attention to every detail of the html design making sure that each part works before it is put onto the web live.


In the year 2006,i was also a part of creating and updating the PTA website for my children's school.That later branched off into helping various school teachers with this same project.

I created a website for my favorite actor from The Lord of the Rings trilogy and The Hobbit http://benjaminfransham.webs.com/

I prefer payment through SafePay Escrow which better ensures both parties’
protection and satisfaction should disputes arise. I only work with employers who
agree to the Escrow service.

I only accept payment by Check, E-check, or Wire Transfer
Funds.Because these  Methods are mutually beneficial.

I am able to communicate with my client through yahoo messenger,msn messanger and email.I check email everyday all day so there is no specific time to be contacted this way.I will always make myself availble for most formsof communication electronically.

As far as office hours go,I am available mornings from 9 am to 10:45 am and at night from 8 pm to midnight.

abstrac: Quick, Reliable Working Partner with Vision
bio:
I bring along strong skills in using / handling MS Office products (Word, Excel, Power Point, Visio and Outlook) and their equivalent products such as Open Office, Google Docs and WordPerfect Office, thorough knowledge of understanding business requirements, giving complete assistance to business partners.

I respond quick to your queries, with fast turn around times, detail oriented, consistent performance across projects makes teaming with me very much dependable. 

I have very strong work ethics, always keeps confidentiality of your data. 

I positively understand business requirements and need to deliver on time, as I worked in live environments throughout my career. 

I worked in different sectors such as Telecom, Retail and Manufacturing. I bring along my expertise and provide quality services to buyers of my services. And my competencies include knowledge of System Development Life Cycle including Customer Support and Data Processing.

Payment Terms:
for Projects less than US$501, payment can be made as per agreed milestones upon completion of individual tasks.
for Projects more than US$500, 20% advance payment and balance as per agreed milestones upon completion of individual tasks.

Accept payment only through Safe Pay Escrow or Safe Pay Invoicing.

abstrac: We build { websites } for today's internet !
bio:
Acumen Consultancy Services Pvt. Ltd. is an IT Development and Services company registered under Software Technology Parks of India (STPI), Kolkata. Acumen was established in the year 2002 and within this span of time Acumen has grown to become one of the strong exponents primarily in the field of Web Technologies successfully developing critical web based solutions for companies based in USA, Europe, Australia and Asia. 

Acumen specializes in providing the entire range of services pertaining to the web that includes web-design, web development, web marketing (SEO) and web-hosting. We specialize in all of these areas with specialized teams working in each of these segments.

Our Service Domains
Acumen specializes in developing complete web based applications for different business domains. We have worked in a wide variety of industry segments starting from manufacturing industries, job consultancy firms, e-commerce stores, real estate, travel and tourism, education etc

? Proposal Stage: -
? Thorough understanding of client’s needs through detailed system study.
? Understanding client’s requirements including technology preferences.
? Providing the client with a brief sketch of the solution development plan and how we can help him to achieve his business goals.
? Signing a Contract or Agreement with the Client.
? Issue of Work-order.
? Pre-Production Stage: -
? Detail project plan sketches are provided to the client.
? Finalization of the database design.
? Approval of project plan from the client.
? Monetary dealings according to the signed agreement or contract.
? Production Stage: -
? Work on defined modules.
? Integrate modules.
? Carrying out consequent quality assurance and testing.
? Review with clients constantly by proper means of communication.
? Deployment of beta release to the client.
? Post-Production Stage: -
? Quality testing and stress analysis.
? Client approval about the project.
? Final Deployment.
?

In my 20 years of full-time writing and now freelancing, I have written about health, personal safety, conservation and advancements in science and technology for various media including the Web, newspapers, magazines, newsletters, brochures, and radio and TV.
